name: ExtensionUKCoreMedicationDosageLastChanged
title: Extension UK Core Medication Dosage Last Changed
description: The date and time that the dosage instructions were last changed.
purpose: This extension extends the MedicationStatement resource to support the exchange of the information about the date and time that the medication dosage instructions were last changed.

element.short: The date when the dosage instructions were last changed.
element.definition: The date when the dosage instructions were last changed.
